review: So far exceeds my expectations. It's fast, bright graphics, and easy-to-use.
author: Ford Smith "Ford"

review: Has lots of choices and remote easy to use and app easy, you have to keep plugged into to power and that is not good, cumbersome and has to be close to electric outlet
author: mw

review: one downfall leading to this rating, the stick must be plugged into power from the wall.  It cannot utilize the power from the tv's usb port.  The reason I got this was to hide it behind the tv.  The need to plug in to the wall doesnt accomplish this for me.
author: David G.

review: Decent nothing that would pull me away from my chromcast
author: Anthony

review: Excellent product - would recommend to everyone...
author: sam

review: I was as easy to hook up as advertised.  We have a great variety of programs to view at about 1/10 the cost of basic cable.  I have hooked up a digital antenna and get my local programs as well.
author: William J. Fitch "Maverick"

review: never received it.  two months back ordered and canceled when I found it cheaper on the shelf at Best Buy........
author: Mark
